name: Michael Glowacki
description: Some people would say I tend to be on the serious and “quiet” side, but don’t let that mislead you! Even then I can be very funny. Also, be “quiet” I do not mean that I don’t talk. By the opposite! Just that I am not laud or “bubbly.” I enjoy long interesting conversations on many topics. In the right setting/context and with the right people, I am very much a people’s person. I have recently learned that I fall in the category of non-shy introvert. I’m also very sensitive and rational, at the same time. Other personality and character traits (according to some people)would be friendly, intellectual, “classy”, reliable, witty, kind, patient, caring, “old-fashioned”, chivalrous, etc. I don’t like drama, nor mind-games, and definitely stay away from that.
